books.author: by David McCullough
books.description: The story of the bicycle mechanics from Ohio who ushered in the age of flight; by the author of “1776” and “The Greater Journey.”
books.name: THE WRIGHT BROTHERS

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A former member of the Navy SEALs discusses his battlefield experiences during the Iraq war; now a movie.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by David Brooks
books.description: The Times columnist extols personal virtues like kindness and honesty in a materialistic age.
books.name: THE ROAD TO CHARACTER

books.author: by Dana Perino
books.description: The Fox News contributor and former press secretary under President George W. Bush reviews her life and career and shares lessons she has learned.
books.name: AND THE GOOD NEWS IS ...

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: The last voyage of the Lusitania, the passenger liner sunk by a German torpedo in 1915; by the author of “The Devil in the White City.”
books.name: DEAD WAKE

books.author: by Atul Gawande
books.description: The surgeon and New Yorker writer considers how doctors fail patients at the end of life, and how they can do better.
books.name: BEING MORTAL

books.author: by Henry Marsh
books.description: Stories of life, death and operating on the brain from the neurosurgeon featured in the documentary film “The English Surgeon.”
books.name: DO NO HARM

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995; now a movie.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by David Fisher
books.description: Stories of the American West; a companion volume to the Fox News series.
books.name: BILL O'REILLY'S LEGENDS AND LIES

books.author: by Willie Nelson with David Ritz
books.description: The country music star discusses his life’s journey, from selling encyclopedias to professional fame.
books.name: IT'S A LONG STORY

books.author: by Taya Kyle with Jim DeFelice
books.description: The widow of Chris Kyle, of “American Sniper” fame, describes her life after his death.
books.name: AMERICAN WIFE

books.author: by Nick Offerman
books.description: The actor, who was formerly a star of “Parks and Recreation,” takes a humorous look at what makes great Americans great.
books.name: GUMPTION

books.author: by Ashlee Vance
books.description: A technology writer follows Musk’s life from his difficult South African childhood to his involvement in Internet start-ups like the rocket company SpaceX, the electric-car company Tesla and the solar power installation company Solar City.
books.name: ELON MUSK

books.author: by Jennifer Arnold and Bill Klein
books.description: The stars of TLC's "The Little Couple" offer a behind-the-scenes account of their relationship, their family and their professional lives.
books.name: LIFE IS SHORT (NO PUN INTENDED)
